DOC.brief_summary: The objective trial evaluate nutritional product people Diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Nutritional Product People With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Subjects eligible study meet follow inclusion criterion : 1 . Diagnosis Type 2 Diabetes . 2 . Age 18 75 year . 3 . HbA1c > 6.0 â‰¤ 8.5 4 . If female childbearing potential , subject nonpregnant , non lactating , least 6 week postpartum agree practice birth control throughout study duration . 5 . BMI > 18.5 kg/m2 < 40.0 kg/m2 . 6 . Chronic medication dosage must stable least two month prior Screening Visit . 7 . Subject state habitual consumer morning meal . Subjects exclude study meet follow criterion : 1 . Use exogenous insulin GLP1 agonists glucose control . 2 . Diagnosis Type 1 diabetes . 3 . History diabetic ketoacidosis . 4 . Current infection ( require medication hospitalization ) , receive corticosteroid treatment last 3 month , surgery receive antibiotic last 3 week . 5 . Active malignancy . 6 . Significant cardiovascular event < 12 week prior study entry . 7 . End stage organ failure status post organ transplant . 8 . Active metabolic , hepatic , gastrointestinal disease . 9 . Chronic , contagious , infectious disease . 10 . Currently take herbal , dietary supplement , medication ( antihyperglycemic medication ) could profoundly affect blood glucose . 11 . History faint adverse reaction response blood collection . 12 . Clotting bleed disorder . 13 . Allergy intolerance study product ingredient .
